name: Shuttle Siege
description: A sci-fi Tower Defense game where your space shuttle is invaded and you have to build mazes of defensive towers to stop the enemies.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Core 2 Duo Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 256 MB graphics memory DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 256 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Core i3 Memory: 4 GB RAM
